member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.Events.EventSubscription`1.GetExecutionStrategy
member.summary: Gets the execution strategy to publish this event.
member.returns: An with the execution strategy, or if the is no longer valid.
member.remarks: If or are no longer valid because they were garbage collected, this method will return . Otherwise it will return a delegate that evaluates the and if it returns will then call . member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.Events.CompositePresentationEvent`1.Subscribe(System.Action{`0},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Subscribes a delegate to an event that will be published on the .
member.param: The delegate that gets executed when the event is published.
When , the keeps a reference to the subscriber so it does not get garbage collected.
member.returns: A that uniquely identifies the added subscription.
member.remarks:
If is set to , will maintain a to the Target of the supplied delegate. If not using a WeakReference ( is ), the user must explicitly call Unsubscribe for the event when disposing the subscriber in order to avoid memory leaks or unexepcted behavior.
The CompositePresentationEvent collection is thread-safe.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.ObservableObject`1
member.summary: Class that wraps an object, so that other classes can notify for Change events. Typically, this class is set as a Dependency Property on DependencyObjects, and allows other classes to observe any changes in the Value.
member.remarks: This class is required, because in Silverlight, it's not possible to receive Change notifications for Dependency properties that you do not own.
member.typeparam: The type of the property that's wrapped in the Observable object

member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.ViewModel.DataTemplateSelector
member.summary: This custom ContentControl changes its ContentTemplate based on the content it is presenting.
member.remarks: In order to determine the template it must use for the new content, this control retrieves it from its resources using the name for the type of the new content as the key.

The new value of the property.
member.remarks: Will attempt to discover the from the by matching the type name of .
